attributes.action: with immediate effect disolve parliament and call a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the undersigned having taken into account the current finacial position created in no small part by the total ineptitude and mismanagement by this current government and having absolutley no confidence in its ability to govern do herebye call upon the prime minister to resign, with immediate effect disolve parliment and call for an imediate general election

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
